name: 伊柏文
objective:
本科目旨在介紹計算機系統與人工智慧之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具 6. 資料結構與演算法 7. 作業系統 8. 檔案與資料庫 9. 資料通訊與計算機網路 10. 人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers and artificial intelligence. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques
schedule:
1-2.Introduction to computer systems 
3-4.Data representation, number systems, and logic 
5-6. Basic Programming Concepts
7-8. Introduction to Data Structures and algorithms 
9-10. Software engineering and system development tools 
11. File and database systems 
12-13. Data communication and computer networks 
14-15. Foundations of Artificial Intelligence
16-17. Emerging techniques
18.  Final Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
Quizzes & Assignments : 40 %
Labs / Mini Projects: 20 %
Attendance : 10 %
Final Project : 30 %
materials:
1.  Computer Science: An Overview- J. Glenn Brookshear and Dennis Brylow
2. "Python Programming: An Introduction to Computer Science- John Zelle 
3.  Artificial Intelligence: A Guide for Thinking Humans" – Melanie Mitchell
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
